So I have to go back to front desk to get physical key. I was told they key doesn’t work on that weekend. Then I used the card key next day it has problem again . Seriously? I ended up getting a car during the stay and they of course charge me high fee for
Manager Response: Dear A7940ERchristiney,  thank you for taking the time to share your detail feedback. I am sorry we did not meet your expectations during your last visit, am not certain of what happened in regards to your digital key as they work just like any physical card. Our shuttle was on a modified schedule but still in service thought the day. Please feel free to contact me personally should  you need anything further.

Summary: This place is a hidden gem! It was extremely clean and the best customer service!!! Will stay here again!!! The rooms were very quiet and very spacious! We were greeted and treated very well. A very reasonable price with high end service and cleanliness!!!
Manager Response: Dear Imqsd6191,  thank you for your amazing feedback. Our team works very hard to provide memorable experiences with each and every guest. We look forward to your next visit here at Hampton Inn Irvine.

Summary: Excellent up to date rooms. Quality sheets, towels and beds. The entire room was cleaned thoroughly. I prefer this location over AirBnB. The staff is very friendly and efficient. Check in process was simple and quick. Parking is an additional charge.
Manager Response: Dear infoformel,  thank you for the great feedback. Our staff prides itself in service and our housekeeping team rocks. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Fresh and modern aesthetic, clean, comfortable and upscale feeling…surprised me. So many hotels fall short in some way (dated, worn,etc.) but I have zero complaints and would stay here again. Had the king plus sofa bed room.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen H,  thank you for your wonderful feedback. We have a great team and comments like yours just motivates them more. We hope to see you again soon here at the Hampton Inn Irvine.

Summary: Very good hotel clean and spacious . Observes Covid 19 protocols . Love the food, free breakfast . Easy check in and check out.  Staff are friendly and observes cleanliness. Organized open space and bright ambiance. I love the clean bathroom..
Manager Response: Dear nhey2802,  thank you for taking the time to share your amazing feedback. We have a great team who prides itself in guest satisfaction. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The reception should tell us about breakfast time when check in. My daughter missed the breakfast because the restaurant closed at 9am. The location is perfect. The cleaness was very good. The hotel should have free water for the guests in the room. Such Small thing could have made us more comfortable. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear nghiabui2022,  thank you for your feedback. I am sorry to hear we missed to disclosed our breakfast times upon check in. Please do not hesitate to call the hotel and ask to speak with me personally to ensure we make this right on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Safe and clean place with breakfast..
Summary: My girls and I could camp there safely before dropping off my sophomore at school in Irvine. We stay here often as they have warm breakfast.  The premises are clean. Staff with great hospitality. Spacious room.
Manager Response: Dear fahmidar625,  thank you for your wonderful feedback. Making our guest happy is our goal and reading comments like these motive our team even more. We look forward to welcoming you back soon here at Hampton Inn Irvine.

Summary: Hotel was very clean and amenities were great. We felt very welcomed by the staff from when we checked in and every time we pass by the front desk. Every morning the breakfast selection was always amazing.
Manager Response: Dear tanjeremiahj,  thank for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback. We are pleased to see you enjoyed your stay and cannot wait to welcome you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine.

Summary: Plan to walk to the airport in the dark if you have an early flight to get to, catch staff and ask for real dairy if you don't like chemical-based creamer, ask also for tongs for baked goods since none is provided, the stairs to the right of the check-in desk are available if you don't want to wait for the single working elevator.  But the rooms are clean and the bed is comfy, although subject to noisy thumping sounds all night in room 331.
Manager Response: Dear Trisha S,  thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Let me begin by apologizing for not having the shuttle available before 6:00am. In regards to our breakfast we pride ourselves in providing only Hilton approved items for our guest. We hope you will allow us to host you once more and should you have any questions I have also reached out to you by email.

Summary: American Airlines canceled our flight to DFW and they put us up at the Hampton. We were very happy with all of the accommodations the hotel had to offer. We will absolutely consider staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Gregg B,  Thanks you for taking the time out of your day to leave us a positive review. We are always happy to help with distress passengers. Hopefully the next time you stay with us it won't be because a cancelled flight! We hope to see you again!

Summary: Hotel was like new. Great environment. We enjoyed the free breakfast. Also appreciated the ability to purchase snacks and drinks. The parking was a bit pricey at $24 per night. The pillows were way too soft and made it hard to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear taralogan71,  thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, I am pleased to see overall your stay was an enjoyable one, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very clean room, comfortable bed, nice breakfast and free airport shuttle. Front desk staff are very accommodating. Internet speed in the room is very good. Bathroom is also very clean and toiletries are there.
Manager Response: Dear subswain,  thank you for such a wonderful rating and for taking the time to share your experience at the Hampton Inn Irvine. We  look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: First I want to say that was great and very helpful all that work in the hotel. The room was super clean and spacious. The location also was convenient, closer to mall, airport and services.  I had good time. Thank you everyone from Hampton in & suites.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time out of your day to leave us this positive review. We are very grateful to have such a great staff and property to work with. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I came in for a dance event, so it was chosen by the event sponsor. It was basically a room for sleep, and the bed didn't disappoint; plus they had a soft pillow, which not all hotels have available. Front desk personal were always welcoming (even at 3 in the morning) and the breakfast crew welcomed me with a smile and greeting.
Manager Response: Dear jeanninekadanelee,  thank you for the great feedback! I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and our amazing team made it better. We would take great pleasure in welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Good hotel but annoyed with staff!
Summary: We were so annoyed with the customer service we received at this hotel. Check-in was smooth and the hotel was comfortable and very clean but the communication between the staff was lacking. We asked for a later check-out because we were so tired from work the night before and a man at the front desk told us to hold while he checked, he came back on and said if 1 was ok and we said yes.  The housekeeping guy knocked the door around 5 minutes before 11 and said he didn't have us down for a later check-out (he was kind of rude) we assured him we already had spoken to a man at the front desk so he left.  We get a call before 1 from the front desk stating that they didn't have us down for a later check-out and we were confused because we had spoken to somebody earlier it was so
Manager Response: Dear wanderlust_senorita  thank you for your feedback as it will help us avoid making this mistake again. We strive to make all of our guest experience the best possible but just failed short due to our miscommunication. I am glad to see your stay was good aside from your check out experience.  I hope you give us another opportunity should you be back in Irvine.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but not for during a pandemic
Summary: Masks weren’t being worn by staff or guests. I wouldn’t recommend staying here until things calm down. Otherwise a nice hotel and the staff were friendly. The rooms were comfortable as well. Really close to the airport as well.
Manager Response: Dear erispi457590,  I would like to start by thanking you for your recognizing our great team and hotel. We are currently following OSHA workplace guidelines and all fully vaccinated team members may chose not to wear a mask. Our guest and team members safety will always be a priority. We hope you will chose to stay with us again should you return to the Irvine area.

Summary: Eric the manager, accommodated my early arrival and I was in my room within 5 min, literally.   Then, I had to check out early, and since I was a Hilton reward member, there was no penalty for unused nights.  Wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear robertbC8111PB,  thank you for taking the time to share your great feedback. I am please we could accommodate you both during your arrival and early departure. We have a great staff and it is always appreciated when our guest recognize it. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The nightly rate went up each night I stayed there, without the reservation agent, at the hotel itself through which I made the reservation, advising me of this pricing scheme.  The third night was forty dollars per night more than the first night!  Shameful.  (Also, the bed was very soft, hence our rating of the night's sleep.)
Manager Response: Dear Gail5724,  let me begin by apologizing for the inconvenience on the third nights rate. Our rates sometimes fluctuate but your confirmation email will display the breakdown. I am glad we corrected the the amount and issued you back a credit. Please let us know if we can be of further assistance.

Summary: The location was very nice, good modern space, with outdoor access for the breaks, great attentive and friendly staff. Parking was super easy and all the technical aspect went well. The lunch boxes were good! The wraps were a great idea as well as the brownies which gave a bit energy in the afternoon! Enough water, soft drinks, coffee and tea! Fantastic day!
Manager Response: Dear 949magalyr  thank you for the kind words and taking the time to share your great feedback. We are pleased you enjoyed your time during your meeting and recognition of our team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Other than the noise from overhead music and all the TVs in the lounge area, all was good.  It also would have been nice to enjoy bar service a little later into the evening.  We always stay at Hampton Inns because of quality and consistency.
Manager Response: Dear fwaltz,  let me begin by offering my condolences for your loss. I am pleased to see you enjoyed your stay during this difficult time. Your suggestion for our bar schedule will be reviewed. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine.

Summary: Like the location and cleanliness but the water pressure is weak! The blue chair in the room is very uncomfortable!! Could use a mirror instead of a painting above the sitting desk. Also we stayed in two connecting rooms, needed a door stopper to prop the door open.
Manager Response: Dear Le Khanh N  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our guest detailed comments will only help making each guest experience that much better. You brought up a great suggestion for the future in regards to our connecting rooms. We would love to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent meeting space... Comfortable room... Accommodating hosts.
Summary: Stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine-Orange County to lead a training with my company. Aloha and Rachel were wonderful to work with. The breakfast was delicious. Meeting space was comfortable and perfectly met our needs. Enjoyed meeting with colleagues at the hotel happy hour after training and the bar tender Corey had wonderful recommendations for food in the area. Looking forward to our next stay!
Manager Response: Dear F794QFdavidc  Thank you for the kind words and recognizing our amazing team members. We are very delighted Aloha, Rachel and Cory were able to make such a positive impression during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport.

Summary Heading: bathrooms badly need to be updated
Summary: i am a hilton honors member and consider myself to be loyal to the brand; my parents always stayed at hamptons and the next generation has followed. this inn was very average compared to other locations, and could truly benefit with a remodel. the bathroom was really pretty bad; it had a shower-over-tub that was small and dark; i am sure it looked clean but it has become worn and looked scuffed and dirty. a shower curtain completed the tired, dated look. (is it just me, or are shower curtains are kind of icky...?) the entire bathroom had one light! no fan, and the light, which was above the sink, made the shower appear even more dismal. compared to a new facility, for instance the sunriver location in st george, with its spacious walk-in shower with glass enclosure, this was
Manager Response: Dear Snowy-fields  I would like to thank you for your feedback as we welcome all guest input. I am sorry you feel our bathroom could use a remodel as we pride ourselves in our hotel, because of personal preference we offer both rooms with tub/shower combination and also full shower rooms with glass enclosures. I am pleased you enjoyed our breakfast and our amazing team! We would love to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Breakfast amazing ! Great size room ! Friendly staff! Will stay at this hotel again! Easy to connect to WiFi. Loved that microwave and mini fridge in the room. Super clean and comfy bed. Will be back again
Manager Response: OCmomlife, thank you for such a wonderful rating and for taking the time to share your experience at the Hampton Inn Irvine. We where so excited to bring back our full hot breakfast and happy you found it amazing! We look forward to welcoming you back.    Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: We stayed three nights while my wife was having surgery at a nearby hospital. The room was in fantastic condition, clean and quite for being near the airport. All of the staff was welcoming and helpful. The staff over-seeing the complimentary breakfast never let items get too low for all dining.
Manager Response: DearX9887CProbertr,  Thank you so much for the wonderful rating we truly appreciate you choosing to stay with us at the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine-Orange County Airport. I hope all went well with your wife's surgery.  We are so delighter you had an enjoyable stay and our team was able to make such a positive impact.  We look forward to welcoming you back.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: I stayed 2 nights for business and chose this hotel based on the good reviews, but unfortunately my experience for parts of my stay didn’t match the good reviews I’d read about. The room was in overall good shape but I question if the bedsheets were changed prior to my arrival, as there were some questionable spots and a hair on the sheets. I did request the linens to be changed the next day and they did that while I was away. Most of of the customer service during my stay was good. Shuttle service to the airport was good, the person who checked me and my coworker in was nice as was the person we talked to the night before we checked out to schedule shuttle service to the airport. However, the morning crew on 8/18 did not have the same level of customer service as everyone else.
Manager Response: Dear minabear5050,  Let me start by saying thank you for choosing to stay with us and being candid with your feedback. Its comments like yours that assist us in making each guest experience that much better. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our guest rooms so I am so sorry we fell short during your experience. I can assure you we can do better so I hope this experience has not marred your view of us. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: This hotel is located across the airport and many good restaurant, some even walking distance. The room was clean and nicer than the Hilton we stayed at in Costa Mesa on Bristol. I would definitely stay here again. The breakfast wasn’t that good and I didn’t like how parking was $24/night. I didn’t notice the permit on some cars. I’m not sure if they even regulate it but I did get charged for parking.
Manager Response: Dear naung03,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so fortunate to be so centrally located to the airport, great restaurants and Newport Beach. I am so happy that you will think of us when booking your next trip to Orange County.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: My second stay here and staff was very helpful both times and nice safe location just would be nice if a staff member would stay in dining area to make sure guests don’t touch the food they aren’t going to eat
Manager Response: Dear garcianata,  I do appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay with us, thank you. I have spoke with our breakfast experience team regarding your concern and we will make sure to monitor our guest experience.   Hope to see you back.  Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: Worst stay, staff was rude, hotel staff wouldn’t clean our trash or give us clean towels. Kept telling us we will bring towels right away. We were there for softball nationals so my daughter kept taking showers and dirtying everything. Took 2 days without showers because they wouldn’t give us towels. Manager came and cleaned our trash and gave us towels. Never compensated us as they said they would. Not worth the money at all!!
Manager Response: Dear coffmans2005  I want to start by saying I am so sorry we fell short of your expectations during your stay. We had spoken the day of your concern and I was the one who assisted in making sure you had everything you needed. You mentioned to me that everyone was so helpful and nice so I am so sorry we came across rude in any way we where only there to make sure you had everything you needed.   I am concerned that you stated that you where never compensated but as we spoke on two separate occasions I assured you, you would be compensated for our shortcomings.  We have compensated you for the issues you communicated to us.   Our housekeeping efforts have changed due to the current Covid restrictions.   I hope you will take into consideration of all the team members who dropped everything they where doing to take care of you when you brought your concerns up to us.   As we spoke on our last call you stated that you where happy with our resolution. Please let me know if I can be of any further assistance.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary Heading: FRONK DESK LISA HITS HOME RUN WITH guests!
Summary: Very few times in life you find a GEM hotel front desk agent .. she made the DIFFERENCE in our stay! (LISA!)  We of course appreciate each and every behind the scenes participant & this (review is for her and the staff) …….she was ALONE, helping about 10 guests at the same time. Making coffee, answering phones, who knows what else. She was kind to give us an extra bottle of water.  The rooms are clean and comfy.  Overall, can’t believe how smooth this stay was.  Thanks, team! You made our *first ever Stay-cation so enjoyable .  Ps. Thanks for breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear TheOliveros,  It was such a pleasure speaking with you during your stay. Thank you for the kind words and recognizing one of our awesome team members Lisa. We are so very delighted Lisa was able to make such a positive impression on your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: Excellent, friendly service by the front desk clerk and staff. Great  location, close to shopping, restaurants and the airport. Overnight parking was expensive those killing the value.I would definitely stay at this facility again.
Manager Response: Dear JohnTamasi,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate when our guest recognize our team members, thank you. Until your next visit.  Have a wonderful day!  Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary Heading: Quick stay for convenient airport access
Summary: Hotel is conveniently close to SNA airport. They even provided a free shuttle service to/from airport. Breakfast was good, hot and cold options, open for self-serve which was great! They also had a grab-n-go option for those who needed it. Staff was friendly, rooms were clean.
Manager Response: Dear Kpbr02,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine-Orange County Airport. We are so excited to again offer our guest our wonderful Hampton breakfast which has so many options our guest can choose from if you are looking to unwind in our dining area or on the run and need something to get you through the day. We look forward to welcoming you back and thank you for taking the time to share your experience.    Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary Heading: Manager and Staff are the WORST
Summary: I did not realize the lack in service and professionalism The Hampton Inn on Dupont drive shows customers.  I've stayed on business numerous time.  The manager is rude & incompetent, I don't think he's had a full time job before.  Even the young receptionist had an attitude for some reason.  Confusing...I'll be taking my money elsewhere.  Hampton Inn needs to do better for the people handing their money over.
Manager Response: Dear Msmith752,  I would like to offer my sincere apology for the less than enjoyable stay you had during your visit in January of 2021.   It is with mixed emotions that I read your review as we do not allow for rudeness of any kind on the part of our employees. I would like to address the issue you experienced but I don't have any information from you on the background to what let up to or the situation that occurred specifically to the negative experience you had with our team members.   Since your stay was five months back in January of this year I would certainly like to get more information as we like to make sure we follow up with our guest when the issue has occurred to make it right and if your dissatisfaction with our service was addressed at that time.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager victor.gonzalez@hilton.com

Summary: We enjoyed our stay! The rooms were beautiful and the staff were all very friendly and helpful. Our only negative was the availability of the airport shuttle. Although that was resolved in the end. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear cshellsashore,  Thank you for the wonderful rating we are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we where able to resolve the shuttle availability. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hampton Inn & Suites Irvine-Orange County Airport.   Victor Gonzalez, General Manager

Summary: Showed up and got nailed an additional $24 a night to park a car. I could have parked at the airport cheaper. Hidden charges just piss me off. If you want an additional $24 a night, add it to the room.
Manager Response: Dear William,  I understand you are upset of the parking fee we charge all our overnight guest who are parking a vehicle. Our obligation is to make sure all our guest are aware of additional fees including parking prior to making a reservation by making sure our website, our travel partner websites and our reservation outlets have all the most updated information. After reviewing your reservation I have confirmed Expedia displays our parking fee under property amenities below is a screen shot of our reservation page on Expedia the outlet you used to make the reservation.   Parking and transportation Self parking on site (USD 24.00 per day; includes in/out privileges) Wheelchair-accessible parking and van parking available Onsite parking includes off-street options Offsite parking available (USD 24.00 per night)  We understand you gave us a low rating due to having to pay for parking and feel your issue was not resolved since we didn't remove your parking fee. It would not be fair for us remove your fee and still charge all of our guest who park a vehicle. I hope you will reconsider the low rating for having to pay for parking as based on your rating for the accommodations, cleanliness and overall service was rated as outstanding and seemed to have enjoyed your stay.   Sincerely,  Victor Gonzalez General Manager

Summary: The hotel very new, very clean and reasonably priced.  We needed a hotel close to Orange County Airport for an early morning flight.  It was very convenient to the airport. The room was beautiful and the bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Taylor89005, thanks for your recent review.  I'm happy that during your one night stay you had a great experience. I must say that even for night night, I personally would appreciate a staying at a  new hotel that was clean and had comfortable beds. The beds makes a difference in providing a good nights sleep.

Summary: As clean & comfortable as this hotel was for us, the downgrade is because I’ve had to get them to detail charges to the two rooms. We were initially charged for two days parking for each of the two rooms. We rented a car for one day to attend services.  No one asked us at check in if we had a car. Maybe there are many business travelers who don’t look at the invoices.  Also while they say they have an airport shuttle it is only available when they have staff.  Other than these two annoyances most of the staff were polite and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and apologize that we fell short of expectations. I do appreciate that you took the time to bring your concerns to us and we'll address them.  We do hope that you'll stay with us again and look forward to making it a better experience.

Summary Heading: Nicest Hampton Inn experience to date...except for parking!
Summary: The Hampton Inn brand is usually very reliable when you are doing a short stay, such as for a night or two.  In this case, we stayed in Irvine for two nights.  The hotel common areas and rooms have a more of a modern feel compared to many other older Hampton Inns, so we very much appreciated that!  The front desk staff members were friendly & helpful.  The included breakfast was really good and COVID-safe!  While many hotels are doing cold breakfasts, Hampton Inn has found a way to serve hot items (all individually wrapped - omelettes, cinnamon rolls, waffles, etc.).  So clever!  My only complaint is the parking situation.  There's a HUGE lot on site.  WHY must parking be a separate charge?  I don't get it, I never will, but it is what it is.  Even with the parking charge, this
Manager Response: Mdgrl79, I must agree it is the nicest Hampton and I am extremely happy that you had a great experience. I ask myself why are we all not on the same page with breakfast but we did figure it out and I'm glad that our team have been able to provide breakfast with hot items during this pandemic. Thank you for staying and writing a review, we do hope to see you back here again when you are in the area.

Summary: Clean!!!! Very Comfortable! Amazing service!  Gals in the front desk was helpful. Complimentary breakfast was a plus! Covid sanitation is on point! Love that there is lots of sanitary stations almost every corner!
Manager Response: What an amazing review! Love it!!! Thank you for your kind words, I do agree that the Gals at the front desk are helpful. During these difficult times, it is important to have sanitary stations and we do our best to have them all over the property. Our team takes every step to make sure the property is clean and sanitized for everyone. We all look for forward to your next visit.

Summary: Staff members were pleasant and very helpful. Our room was modest, and pretty clean. The acoustics were loud. Stepping off of the bed or across the room was strangely loud and rattled the floor. My apologies to the people below us. At bedtime I realized how thin the wall insulation was as the gentleman next door sneezed three times and woke us up. Grateful he was alone. My apologies to him as I am positive that our 4:00 am alarm woke him up. Proximity to the airport was great, as was the shuttle service.
Manager Response: Geshundteit, thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. I am happy to know that our team was pleasant and helpful during your stay. My apologies on behalf of the other guest sneezing, and I'm sure if the alarm was an issue for him, he would have said something as I probably would have. But thank you for mentioning it. We hope you will visit us again soon.

Summary: The only set back was the additional charge for parking in the hotel parking lot $35.   You would think with the price of the room and lodge the parking is included but nope. Outrageous and disappointing.
Manager Response: Hello Ilovetraveling760, I would be disappointed as well if I had to pay a $24 a night parking fee. Our property is in the airport district and as you may or may not be aware of, all the hotels in the airport are do have a parking fee as $35, luckily we are much lower than most other hotels.  Our team do appreciate your rating as it seems other than the parking, your experience was pretty good.  We do hope you come back to visit us again.  Thank you!

Summary: It was a nice relaxing getaway :)  My girlfriend and I spent two nights and it was wonderful! We usually go for Airbnb’s but it was a last minute thing ! They had good deals !  We got lots of much need rest from work and life’s stresses! The room was super clean and everyone was super nice!! Will come again c:
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Vmarie1377.  We work hard to meet expectations like yours and we're happy to hear we hit the mark for you especially since you and your girlfriend were able to get the rest you needed. Sounds like a getaway I need.  Come back and see us again soon, Cheers!

Summary: Staff was friendly, the pool area and rooms were clean.  Very quiet area and safe.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  Plenty of parking and always felt like the hotel staff were attentive to any needs.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us - and we agree that our hotel is extremely accommodating property and that our staff are attentive to our guest's needs.. We count our ourselves lucky to have guests like you. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Our family decided to come to OC a day earlier and needed a hotel quick. This property had availability and was close to Huntington Beach, our final destination the next day. Our family had adjoining rooms which my son locked us all out of one of the rooms. Even though it was late at night when the lock-out occurred the front desk staff Joann and Alance tried their best to help us to no avail. The maintenance staff was able to help us the next morning successfully. Upon checkout the other front staff, Denise and GM Evan we wonderful. The property is very clean, updated amenities along with convenient location. Thanks to all of you for making a crappy situation better!
Manager Response: JessLTwins, thans for your rating and excellent review. I am very happy to know that our team was able to provide the best service to you during your experience. I am happy that everything work our for your family and I appreciate that you recognize the team, THANK YOU.

Summary: Huge thank you to Denise at the front desk! So friendly and willing to help. 100% an excellent place to stay in OC...super clean & everyone was so nice. Breakfast was terrific. Parking is easy. Appreciated the room amenities too.
Manager Response: 508dagnyt, thank you for your recent review of our property and your experience. We are happy to hear that you had an excellent and terrific stay. Thanks for recognizing our team especially Denise. We look forward to your visit.

Summary: Great! One of the best hotels you can ever stay at. I recommend everyone to stay here, at least one time to experience it. Service and cleanliness I say is my top thing I look in at a hotel and I say this hotel checks off both.
Manager Response: Rayojoshua, thank you for your kinds words and compliments. I'm happy that you had a great experience and took the time to share it. We hope that if you are ever in the area again, you will stay with us.  Again, thank you.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean and well-appointed room for the location and price
Summary: We stayed just one night (Thursday) on our way back from a big driving tour of the desert areas (Coachella, Salton Sea, Anza-Borrego SP).  We were meeting my niece in Tustin for brunch the next day, and a big trip to the Wine Exchange in Santa Ana on our way home to Ventura County.   We stayed in a double Queen room.  Very clean, quiet and comfortable.  Well appointed bathroom, efficient check in and out.  Disliked paying the $24 a day parking, but all the hotels charge similar rates.  Could not beat the nightly rate we got for the room at any other place.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Lori S, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your recent experience. We certainly appreciate it. Thank you for the recommendation and our team look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Incredible room, very clean and quiet for being next to the airport, had zero problems with noise.. Had an issue where I was not told about overnight parking charge. Receptionist helped me clear it up easily to revert it, great support and help. Would absolutely stay again in a heartbeat, girlfriend and I loved the place.
Manager Response: E-Fletch19, thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We are thrilled that you had a fantastic stay, especially since our agent was able to assist your your minor issue. Our team look forward to welcoming you back on your future stay.

Summary: Immaculate facility, helpful and kind staff. I phoned for their shuttle service from the airport and the driver came over quickly. The hotel is an excellent value. There are vending type meals available, no room service or restaurant though complimentary breakfast is served. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance. I'll be staying here again, highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we certainly appreciate you choosing to stay at our property.
